result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operate w/o Valid License (2nd w/in 3 yrs)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. ISAAC L PRESSLEY

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on November 15, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

11:43 AM  Defendant ISAAC L PRESSLEY not in court.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis in court for ISAAC L PRESSLEY.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 21CF64, 21CM185 and 22CF105. Court makes statement to Atty Kapelis regarding the request for the defendant to appear via zoom. Court also advises Atty Kapelis that he signed a warrant for another case for this defendant. Court sets for internal review on all cases until the defendant turns himself in. The Court will then schedule the next appearance for the defendant.

Court adjourned at 11:45 AM

10:49 AM Defendant ISAAC L PRESSLEY in court.  Attorney Matt McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis appeared by video for ISAAC L PRESSLEY. Atty Kapelis requests a jury trial for 21CF64. Court sets Status Hearing Sept 20, 2022 at 11:00 AM. Motions and Witness Lists due the day before. The 21CM185 to track.

22CF105, State files an information with the court. Attorney Kapelis acknowledges receipt of the information and waives any reading. Atty Kapelis enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant. Court confirms it mirrors the criminal complaint. Case to track. 

Court adjourned at 10:50 AM.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Points of Consideration - filed by Tony Lopes, Bondsman, Kind Bail Bonds, Inc

9:06 AM Defendant ISAAC L PRESSLEY in court.  Attorney Michael Kapelis present in court with the defendant. Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Kapelis states he will be appointed on this case and the defendant is requesting a preliminary.

Kevin Manning sworn, direct by DA Laspisa is employed as a Patrol Sergeant for Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Was employed in the date in question. Testimony given. Identified the defendant present in court. Cross exam by Atty Kapelis. Court questions witness. DA requests the Court take judicial notice of 2021CF64. No objection by Atty Kapelis. Statement by the Court.

Court finds probable cause to believe that a felony has been committed and that the felony probably was committed by the defendant and binds the defendant over for trial. State will file an information. 

Court adjourned at 9:13 AM

Court will set for Arraignment on August 2, 2022 at 10:30 AM
Arraignment scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 10:30 am.

2:21 PM  Defendant ISAAC L PRESSLEY in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Michael Kapelis present with the defendant. Court calls all cases. Atty Kapelis requests a preliminary hearing be scheduled on 2022CF105. Court sets for preliminary hearing on July 20, 2022 at 9:00 AM. (1/2 hr) All other cases to track with. Statement by DA Laspisa regarding charges in Las Vegas. Court makes statement to the defendant.

Court adjourned at 2:23 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.

3:16 PM Defendant ISAAC L PRESSLEY in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Court informs the defendant that Atty Kapelis represents him on a case that is scheduled for tomorrow. Defendant to contact the PD's office and come back tomorrow - July 12, 2022 at 2;00 PM

Court adjourned at 3:18 PM
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on July 12, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Phone call from Tony L. of Kind Bail Bonds out of Nevada. He stated the defendant has open warrants out of Clark County, Nevada and wanted the Court to be aware of this. He stated he has attempted to contact the DA's office to inform them as well.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on July 11, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:18 AM Defendant ISAAC L PRESSLEY in court.  Attorney Michael Kapelis in court with the defendant. Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 2022CF105 & 2022TR438. Atty Kapelis states the defendant qualifies for PD representation. Atty Kapelis confirms receipt of the criminal complaint, waives reading and requests a preliminary hearing. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count and as repeater. DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of prelim on July 11, 2022 at 3:15 PM. Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY to the TR citation.

Court adjourned at 9:25 AM
